objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Romance lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about food and dining out using formal register
Students create original romance themed content about food and dining out in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Romance story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using formal register in romance context
Character B: Responding in formal register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with heart
food and dining out with passion
food and dining out with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
